page.shortlink: api desktop api waitdialog class set bottom message function
page.description: The .SET_BOTTOM_MESSAGE() method sets the message to display below the progress bar. The message is only visible if Message_Rows (in <WAITDIALOG>.CREATE()) is greater than 1.

argument.name: Message
argument.description: The message to display below the progress bar.

section.note: You can use CRLF() to break the message into multiple lines.
